name: _circuit_
description:
The system is infected. It is up to you, the totally legit anti-virus software, to rid the bowels of the computer of the malicious virus. Just try not to break the system too much.

-Explore an intricate interconnected world

-Like a true metroidvania, you must find new abilities to gain access to new areas

-Collect five hidden microchips

-Original music

This was made in one week for the 64th Weekly Game Jam, in which the theme was "Glitch".

Design, coding, art - kypello

Design, voiceover - Felldor

Music, SFX - Cyazon
